typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SchemaName as string,
		table_name as string,
		pk_name as string,
		columnd as string,
		HubName as string,
		SATname as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> config
config select(mapColumn(
		SchemaName,
		table_name,
		pk_name,
		columnd,
		HubName,
		SATname
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(input(
		TableName as string,
		BusinessKeys as string,
		HASHDIFFValues as string,
		SCHEMAName as string,
		HubTable as string,
		SatName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		TableName = table_name,
		BusinessKeys,
		HASHDIFFValues = columnd,
		SCHEMAName = SchemaName,
		HubTable = HubName,
		SatName = SATname
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Process
